name: Office Jousting
description:
Take hold of your cleaning utensil and bop your co-worker in the face!

This is a local 2-player web game.
Keep your tip up using "W" (Player 1) or "O" (Player 2).

Created by Victor Weidar: https://victor-weidar.itch.io/
and VC Penguin: https://vcpenguin.itch.io/

as a 4 hour game jam.
